title: My Inferno Syndra skin concept and abilities

embed.description: Made another LoL skin I will be making a splash art for it too

body: Hey guys, i made another skin :3 this time for Syndra! I will be making a splash art for this concept aswell and i hope you can give me feed back, i call this Inferno Syndra

replies.body:
Abilities look nice and I'm sure many people would like the idea, but actual skin+outfit design is solidly average if not outright boring, nothing different from what's already on the store. Consider shaking up your designs with influences from makeup/costume designers:

https://s-media-cache-ak0.pinimg.com/736x/3d/a0/f8/3da0f8d0b34f069c536815e72b526d80.jpg
https://s-media-cache-ak0.pinimg.com/736x/00/5c/b8/005cb827ba20dc2f38270934058e836d.jpg
http://tinyurl.com/o7sgech
https://s-media-cache-ak0.pinimg.com/236x/de/62/f0/de62f0cbcd240f47be9edb5d5526c5c3.jpg
https://s-media-cache-ak0.pinimg.com/236x/f6/64/14/f6641426b7668bdef468322c8980623f.jpg

There's so much you could do with her headdress in particular. It's just a waste to regurgitate her old template and colour palletes already used by dozens of other champ skins.
I really like the last image! thanks for these
Insta buy, looks amazing :D Really good job man.
it looks like a mix between shyvanna and syndra witch is awesome-ly strong
I would totally buy it, even in this quality. Still better than Queen of Diamonds.

That's Awesome!! :D I was just thinking about how Syndra needs a new skin and FIRE is DEFINITELY the way to go!! Only thing is that i think there could maybe be more detail to her clothing, like, some golden swirls or something. :)  Regardless, I would totally buy this the way it is now. :)

I really approve of this in concept. Syndra is a champ I love the concept of in general, so I am a little disappointed in her other skins, they don't really scream "ABSOLUTE POWER" type of deal. However a fiery theme really does speak to that overall concept of "power mad" or otherwise.

Though I do agree with some other posts on here that say her outfit is just a bit bland. Possibly stylizing the outfit to be made of fire and burning, or something other than basically a re-colour of her original outfit, would be awesome.
Thank you! yeah i agree now when i look back at it xD i might change the outfit when i make the splash art of it.. eventually
Nice concept, however I have to comment, Your syndra looks like Shyvanna.
Yeah, i gotta say, it really does. Especially her body.
